title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 348.3 - Postponement of educational session
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 348.3 - Postponement of educational session

State Regulations

Postponement of a scheduled educational session will not be
granted except for extraordinary and unavoidable circumstances. Requests for a
postponement for such circumstances must be made in writing. Any establishment
requesting such a postponement must agree in writing to attend an educational
session on a date as specified by the department within one week of the
originally scheduled session. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1

348.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
